item.title: Roblox: 99 Nights in the Forest Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
99 Nights in the Forest is a Roblox game where you explore a foggy forest in search of lost children. It's a great experience if you like games with lots of crafting, but also want an interesting storyline. As the name suggests, you have to survive 99 nights, which is quite a challenge even for experienced gamers, especially considering the terrifying monsters lurking in the forest. However, such a serious challenge only fuels curiosity, so it's no surprise that hundreds of thousands of players have already tried the game.

The mystery of the forest is not easily solved, so it would be nice to get some additional rewards, especially for beginners. That's why we've created a guide where you'll find all the information about redeeming 99 Nights in the Forest codes.

Updated September 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: 99 Nights in the Forest currently has a single reward available for you to claim. It provides a small bonus that can help you progress more smoothly as you play. Since there’s only one option right now, it’s a good idea to grab it before it expires. Keep an eye out for future updates that may add more rewards.

All 99 Nights in the Forest Codes

Working 99 Nights in the Forest Codes

  • afterparty - redeem this code to get 15 Gems. (NEW)

Expired 99 Nights in the Forest Codes

There are no expired codes for 99 Nights in the Forest yet. If any codes expire, we will add them here.

How to Redeem Codes in 99 Nights in the Forest

The redemption system is finally here in the game. If you don't know how to get your freebies, follow the steps below:

  1. Launch 99 Nights in the Forest .
  2. Click on the diamond icon in the bottom left corner of the screen.
  3. Click on the Codes button.
  4. Paste a code and get your rewards.

How to Get More 99 Nights in the Forest Codes

If the developers haven't left any working code on the Roblox game page, it can be hard to find. One of the best ways to find working codes is to use guides like this one. We update it regularly, so you can be among the first to redeem the codes and receive rewards. If you are also interested in official sources of information from the 99 Nights in the Forest developers, we recommend visiting the following websites:

  • 99 Nights in the Forest Roblox game page
  • 99 Nights in the Forest Roblox group
  • 99 Nights in the Forest Discord server
Roblox

item.description:
Jump Links

  • Driving Empire Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire
  • How to Play Driving Empire
  • The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire
  • About the Driving Empire Developers

For Roblox players who cannot afford to buy themselves a new in-game car, there are Driving Empire codes that offer cash as a free reward. All of these active and expired codes can be found listed below. In addition, fans of the game will find step-by-step instructions on how to redeem Driving Empire codes here, along with a guide on how to play the popular Roblox game.

Updated September 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Driving Empire continues to provide rewards that give you a mix of cars, cash, and other useful items. These extras help you expand your garage, customize your vehicles, and progress faster in the game. Check back often so you don’t miss any upcoming rewards.

Codes Checked on September 27, 2025.

Driving Empire Codes

All Working Driving Empire Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Driving Empire

Like with many other Roblox games, Driving Empire codes are available for everyone. To redeem them, players need only follow the straightforward steps below to claim their free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Driving Empire.
  2. Look in the bottom left corner and press the Settings button here.
  3. From here, go into the Codes tab and insert the code into the text box.
  4. Once done, press Submit and claim rewards.

Codes can only be redeemed once per account. That said, players can claim the same code on multiple accounts.

How to Play Driving Empire

Playing Driving Empire is very simple and fun. To begin with, after the player has appeared in the world, they'll need to choose a car. There are many real-world cars in the game and each of them has its own characteristics, but only two cars will be available at first. To earn money, players have to drive, drift, and participate in races. For the money earned, players can buy a new car or motorbike. With the Driving Empire codes in this article, Roblox players can buy new vehicles even faster.

The Best Roblox Racing Games Like Driving Empire

There are a lot of Roblox games with the theme of racing and cars in general, and among them are plenty of good ones that offer an interesting gaming experience. In this article, players will find the best games like Driving Empire :

  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • Drive World
  • Southwest Florida
  • Vehicle Legends
  • Ultimate Driving

About the Driving Empire Developers

Driving Empire was created by a group of developers who call themselves Voldex. Although they have released one game so far, their Roblox group already has 2 million members.

item.title: All Geometry Dash Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Codes For Geometry Dash
  • All Active The Wraith Vault Codes
  • All Active Vault Codes
  • All Active Vault of Secrets Codes
  • All Active Chamber of Time Codes

Geometry Dash launched in August 2013 and quickly earned a cult following that appreciated the rhythm-based game. Jamming to the music of every level, players did their best to complete various Geometry Dash levels and earn diamonds and other prizes to unlock more in-game content, such as avatars and modes. Developed by RobTop Games, Geometry Dash rose quickly in its player base, and has remained prominent among indie gamers, thanks to its simple approach and rise in players across social media platforms. Players can also develop their own levels, challenging fellow Geometry Dash players around the world to take it on for bragging rights.

Updated September 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Geometry Dash gives you plenty of working codes across the Wraith Vault, Vault, Vault of Secrets, and Chamber of Time. These rewards cover everything from icons, ships, and waves to orbs, shards, keys, and other useful items. The mix of cosmetics and resources makes it easy to personalize your game while also picking up progress boosts. Make sure to return later, as more codes are often added with updates.

All Codes For Geometry Dash

Geometry Dash players looking to add some extra icons and colors can gain access to a set of three vaults; The Vault, The Vault of Secrets, and The Chamber of Time, all of which come with their own series of codes and unlockables for this mobile game. Each vault requires certain criteria in order to be unlocked, and until then, players will not be able to access them or use any of the available codes.

These codes will also expire at random intervals, so redeeming them quickly is essential to ensuring access to the available icons and colors. Codes can only be redeemed once per account. Be sure to check back frequently, as codes can be released anytime during the month to introduce new stages, icons, and colors.

Codes Checked on September 27, 2025.

All Active The Wraith Vault Codes

  • thickofit – 1 Mana Orb​ (NEW)
  • skibidi – 1 Mana Orb (NEW)
  • fireinthehole – 1 Fire Shard​ (NEW)
  • robtopisnice – 10 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • bussin – 69 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • wellmet – 5 Diamonds​ (NEW)
  • checksteam – 1 Demon Key​ (NEW)
  • touchgrass – 1 Earth Shard (NEW)
  • wateronthehill – 1 Ice Shard​ (NEW)
  • backondash – Cube 409​ (NEW)
  • key – 1 Demon Key​ (NEW)
  • geometry – Ball 90​ (NEW)
  • citadel – Cube 231​ (NEW)
  • retrospective – Ship 121​ (NEW)
  • iaminpain – 10 Diamonds, 100 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • ruins – Ball 91​ (NEW)
  • spacegauntlet – 20 Diamonds, 1 Demon Key, 2 Metal Shards​ (NEW)
  • cheatcodes – UFO 138 (NEW)
  • backstreetboy – Robot 37​ (NEW)
  • noelelectra – Swing 17​ (NEW)
  • gd2025 – 1 Yellow Key, 25 Diamonds, 25 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • duckstep – Ship 146​ (NEW)
  • skylinept2 – Cube 309​ (NEW)
  • boogie – Wave 92​ (NEW)
  • buttonmasher – UFO 63​ (NEW)
  • gdawards – Cube 485 (NEW)
  • ncsalbum – Jetpack 8​ (NEW)
  • gullible – 1 Mana Orb​ (NEW)
  • putyahandsup – UFO 71​ (NEW)

How to Redeem The Wraith Vault Codes in Geometry Dash

To redeem codes in The Wraith vault, you need to do the following:

  1. Open Geometry Dash and navigate to the main levels screen.​
  2. Scroll to find and select The Tower level.​
  3. Once inside The Tower, tap the icon resembling a face located in the bottom right corner to access The Wraith vault.​
  4. Enter each code into the text box one at a time.​
  5. If the code everything is okay, the corresponding reward will be granted.​

All Active Vault Codes

  • Lenny – Lenny icon
  • Blockbite – UFO
  • Spooky – Shy Guy Icon
  • Neverending – UFO
  • Mule – Ship
  • Ahead – Wave
  • Gandalfpotter – Trail
  • Sparky – Secret Coin
  • Robotop – Robot
  • (enter your in-game username) – Eye
  • 8-16-30-32-46-84 – Illuminati Wave

How to Redeem Vault Codes in Geometry Dash

Players can unlock The Vault in Geometry Dash by simply collecting 10 Silver User Coins . One method to get three Silver User Coins is to complete an Online Feature Level without dying. After unlocking the Vault in Geometry Dash , follow these easy steps to gain access to The Vault and use the aforementioned codes:

  1. Launch the game and open Settings by tapping on the icon at the bottom of the screen.
  2. An open lock icon will appear in the top right corner of the screen, which can be clicked to enter The Vault.
  3. In the box under the ‘ What are you poking around for?’ message, enter each available code, one at a time.
  4. If the code is correctly entered and is still valid, the reward will be distributed.

All Active Vault of Secrets Codes

  • Robotop – Robot
  • Octocube – the Octopus-Shaped Icon
  • Brain Power – the Brain-Shaped Icon
  • Seven – Finn (Adventure Time) Icon
  • thechickenisonfire – Swamp Green color
  • The Challenge – Vault Keepers level
  • Gimmiethecolor – Dark Red color
  • (Your number of stars*) – an Icon (players can find the number of stars on the game's main menu)
  • It’s a Puzzle – an Icon
  • Glubfub – a Secret Coin

How to Redeem Vault of Secrets Codes in Geometry Dash

In order to use the codes listed above, players will need to earn 50 Diamonds in Geometry Dash . This can be done by opening daily chests, completing daily quests, opening Treasure Room chests, opening a weekly Demon chest, and attempting Gauntlet levels. Once players have acquired the appropriate amount of gems, the following steps will need to be taken:

  1. Launch the game and click on the icon in the main menu.
  2. Click on the unlocked icon in the top right corner of the screen, this time choosing to enter The Vault of Secrets.
  3. Enter the desired code in the text box.
  4. If the code is correctly entered and is still valid, the reward will be distributed.

All Active Chamber of Time Codes

  • Volcano – Wave
  • River – Dark Green color
  • Silence – Second default Icon
  • Darkness – Face Icon
  • Hunger – Hungry Icon

How to Redeem Chamber of Time in Geometry Dash

To use the codes listed above, players will need to go to The Vault of Secrets, begin the secret challenge, and beat it to unlock The Chamber of Time in Geometry Dash . Players have to go through the following steps in order to gain access to the codes:

  1. Go to The Vault of Secrets and type " The Challenge" in the code redemption box, without quotations. This will begin a level that costs 200 Diamonds to enter.
  2. Complete the level and then tap on the door icon in the bottom right area of the screen .
  3. Go to the basement to find a locked demon who will ask you to unlock the door. Tap on all three keyholes to activate them.
  4. Go to the "Coming Soon!" section on the game's main selection page and click on the "i" icon to prompt a door and interact with the gatekeeper.
  5. Go back to The Vault of Secrets with 500 Diamonds in hand and press the button to enter an area with a green rope. Click it to open the secret shop and purchase the Master Emblem. Go back to the "Coming Soon!" section and open the door to enter the third chamber. Once inside, enter the code to redeem the prize.
Geometry Dash
7.3 /10
Released
August, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours!

Rhythm-based Action Platforming! Lots of levels with unique soundtracks! Build and share your own levels using the level editor! Unlock new icons and colors to customize your character!

Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more! Use practice mode to sharpen your skills! Lots of achievements and rewards! Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

Developer(s)
Robert Topala
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, PC
Powered by

Da Hood is inspired by the popular Grand Theft Auto series, with the developers also managing to implement the atmosphere of gangster blocks and constant shootings. In this article, Roblox players will find plenty of codes for Da Hood , which they can then redeem to get cash and buy good weapons.

Updated September 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Da Hood offers a set of active rewards that give you a solid boost of in-game cash. How to Redeem Codes in Da Hood

When it comes to redeeming codes in Da Hood , players just need to follow a few quick steps:

  1. Launch Da Hood
  2. Click on the Treasure Chest button on the bottom left of the screen
  3. Click inside the Enter Code Here box and paste the code
  4. Click Redeem to complete the process

Da Hood Tips and Tricks

To have a good time in the game, players need to have Da Hood Cash. To get Da Hood Cash, they can visit various stores, some of which will pay them for collecting shoes. Alternatively, players can use the above codes, which will provide them with a large amount of Da Hood Cash. In order to avoid feeling sad from the constant harassment of other gamers, players need to find and buy weapons, ammunition, and armor, which can be found in certain stores.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood

Although Da Hood is a fun game, there may come a time when it becomes boring. Often, in such cases, players look for alternatives. And to make it all easier for them, below is a list of the best games like Da Hood :

  • Ohio
  • Arsenal
  • East Brickton
  • Combat Warriors
  • Military Tycoon

About the Da Hood Developers

Da Hood developers are pretty productive, and their Da Hood Entertainment group has over 1 million members. They are also very active on their Discord server, where users can find many exciting things.

Roblox is home to an ever-expanding library of community-created worlds and experiences. Whether you’re in the mood for an epic role-playing adventure game or just want to hang out with your friends, there’s always something new and exciting to play.
Connect with friends and millions of players from around the world across Xbox One, computers, smartphones, tablets, and virtual reality devices.
Mix-and-match accessories, body parts, and more to customize your avatar. You can be anything you want to be: a ninja pirate, a mermaid princess, a robot wizard, the possibilities are limitless.

item.title: Roblox: Kick a Brainrot Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Kick a Brainrot is a tycoon game that takes the popular Roblox concept of hatching creatures from eggs and raising them on a farm. However, the developers wanted to make the game unique, so they added cool mechanics that greatly increase the variety of gameplay. The main mechanic is described in the title: you need to kick a brainrot creature to add value to it. There are also mini-events that change the appearance of the map and add new eggs.

To make it easier for beginners to play, the developers have added a code redemption option. If you want to get cool rewards for free, redeem Kick a Brainrot codes from our list.

Updated September 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Kick a Brainrot has some fresh rewards available that give you handy boosts to use while playing. These bonuses can make it easier to progress and get more out of each session. They’re only available for a limited time, so it’s worth claiming them while you can. Be sure to check back later for more updates and future rewards.

All Kick a Brainrot Codes

Working Kick a Brainrot Codes

  • 80KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 1h Cash Boost. (NEW)
  • 20MVISITS - Redeem this code to get 1h Luck Boost. (NEW)

Expired Kick a Brainrot Codes

  • 70KLIKES
  • 250KMEMBERS
  • 5MVISITS
  • 25KLIKES
  • 1MVISITS
  • 10KLIKES

By redeeming Kick a Brainrot codes, you can get a rare egg or some in-game currency. So, regardless of your experience in the game, it will be useful to get a little freebie.

How to Redeem Codes in Kick a Brainrot

In most Roblox games, redeeming codes is straightforward. In this game, the “Codes” button is located directly in the game interface, making it easy to use. However, it is easy for newcomers to overlook, so to assist you, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Kick a Brainrot :

  • Launch Roblox and open Kick a Brainrot .
  • Look at the right side of the screen. Click the purple Codes button.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click the checkmark button.

Remember, codes expire over time, so you need to redeem them as soon as possible to get rewards.

How to Get More Kick a Brainrot Codes

Sometimes you can find Roblox codes right in the game or on the page, but that's a rare thing. Usually, to find codes, you have to search for them in developers' social media accounts or on various gaming websites, and often, they are no longer valid. We regularly update our guides and add new working codes. To make sure you don't miss out on gifts, we recommend bookmarking this guide in your browser using the Ctrl+D key combination. But if you're more interested in the developers' social media accounts, you can follow the links below:

  • Kick a Brainrot Roblox game page
  • Kick a Brainrot Roblox group
  • Kick a Brainrot Discord server
